root.name: Battle Slots
root.description: Battle Slots is Phantom EFX's attempt to break into the XBLA and PSN markets. Gameplay The overworld is a series of nodes that represent towns and other places of interest for the player to do certain actions such as picking up quests. The battles have a five-slot slot machine where different combinations of symbols on the slot machine result in different events. The player has a health meter as well as action and magic bars that can accumulate points to allow the player to activate different abilities. StoryNothing is known of the story but screen shots show that the world is fantasy based.
